Description:
Join Rick Claus and Sonia Cuff for a fun, fast-paced guide to getting the most out of your time at Microsoft Ignite. Learn how the conference is laid out, how to plan your day, and where to find answers from the experts â€“ be they MVPs, Microsoft Partners or the Product teams. Get the inside scoop on all the event experiences. From Breakouts to the "hallway track", this session will help you build your network and make the most of your Ignite experience.
